name: Vibeflow
summary: Human-in-the-loop AI orchestration system that keeps non-technical users in strategic control while automating modular agent workflows.
objectives: Deliver lean, observable AI-assisted development workflows
Avoid bloat and vendor lock-in by choosing modular tools
Keep humans in control of planning, approvals, and production gates

high: Directly improves agent orchestration, observability, or ROI analytics
Replaces heavy platforms with lean, modular alternatives aligned with Vibeflow philosophy
Provides actionable guidance for Supervisor, Analyst, or Maintenance agents
moderate: General AI tooling or workflow insights that can be adapted soon
Emerging research that could influence near-term planning or architecture
Design patterns that reinforce human-in-the-loop governance
archive: Interesting but not actionable within the next quarter
Tools or ideas that conflict with Vibeflow’s lean, modular stance
Content unrelated to software agent orchestration or non-coder empowerment

promptHints.classification: Decide if the item is High, Moderate, or Archive usefulness for Vibeflow. Use the PRD and criteria to justify the rating, and suggest next steps when appropriate.
